summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 60th Street, from 7th Avenue Northwest to a connection with the existing pavement on 14th Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 93266 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
